snippet.title: Wizard With A Gun - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Devolver Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the slick animated trailer and gameplay overview showcasing the features of Wizard With A Gun, including your objectives, collecting resources for survival, crafting, and more from this upcoming multiplayer sandbox survival game. Wizard With a Gun will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC later in 2023, and a single-player demo for the game is available now on Steam.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
